name: Home Assistant
description: Control and query a Home Assistant smart home instance. Manage devices, automations, areas, dashboards, and more.

credentials.name: url
credentials.label: Home Assistant URL
credentials.description: Base URL of your Home Assistant instance (e.g. http://homeassistant.local:8123)

credentials.name: access_token
credentials.label: Long-Lived Access Token
credentials.description: Created in Home Assistant → Profile → Long-Lived Access Tokens

functions.name: search_entities
functions.description: Search for entities by name, domain, or area. Returns matching entity IDs, states, and attributes.

query.description: Search term to match against entity names and IDs

domain.description: Filter by domain (e.g. light, switch, sensor, climate)

limit.description: Maximum results to return. Defaults to 50.

functions.name: get_state
functions.description: Get the current state and attributes of a specific entity.

functions.name: get_overview
functions.description: Get an overview of the Home Assistant instance with entity counts by domain and system info.

detail_level.description: Level of detail: minimal (counts only), standard (counts + problem entities), full (all entities). Defaults to standard.

functions.name: list_services
functions.description: List available services, optionally filtered by domain.

domain.description: Filter services to this domain (e.g. light, switch, climate)

functions.name: call_service
functions.description: Call a Home Assistant service to control a device or trigger an action.

domain.description: Service domain (e.g. light, switch, climate, media_player)

service.description: Service name (e.g. turn_on, turn_off, toggle, set_temperature)

return_response.description: Whether to return the service response. Defaults to false.

functions.name: bulk_control
functions.description: Execute multiple service calls in sequence. Use for controlling several devices at once.

functions.name: get_history
functions.description: Get state history for an entity over a time period.

entity_id.description: Entity ID to get history for

start_time.description: Start time in ISO 8601 format. Defaults to 24 hours ago.

end_time.description: End time in ISO 8601 format. Defaults to now.

functions.name: get_statistics
functions.description: Get long-term statistics for entities (e.g. energy, temperature trends).

statistic_ids.description: Array of statistic IDs (usually entity IDs for sensor entities)

start_time.description: Start time in ISO 8601 format. Defaults to 24 hours ago.

end_time.description: End time in ISO 8601 format. Defaults to now.

period.description: Statistics period: 5minute, hour, day, week, month. Defaults to hour.

functions.name: get_logbook
functions.description: Get logbook entries showing events and state changes.

start_time.description: Start time in ISO 8601 format. Defaults to 24 hours ago.

end_time.description: End time in ISO 8601 format. Defaults to now.

functions.name: get_automation
functions.description: Get automation configuration. Returns all automations or a specific one by ID.

automation_id.description: Specific automation ID to retrieve. Omit to list all.

functions.name: set_automation
functions.description: Create or update an automation configuration.

automation_id.description: Automation ID to update. Omit to create a new automation.

config.description: Automation configuration object with trigger, condition, action, etc.

functions.name: remove_automation
functions.description: Delete an automation by ID.

functions.name: get_automation_traces
functions.description: Get execution traces for automations to debug their behavior.

automation_id.description: Filter traces to a specific automation

limit.description: Maximum traces to return. Defaults to 20.

functions.name: get_script
functions.description: Get script configuration. Returns all scripts or a specific one by ID.

script_id.description: Specific script ID to retrieve. Omit to list all.

functions.name: set_script
functions.description: Create or update a script configuration.

script_id.description: Script ID (required for both create and update)

config.description: Script configuration object with sequence, mode, etc.

functions.name: remove_script
functions.description: Delete a script by ID.

functions.name: list_areas
functions.description: List all areas (rooms/locations) configured in Home Assistant.

functions.name: set_area
functions.description: Create or update an area. Omit area_id to create; include it to update.

area_id.description: Area ID to update. Omit to create a new area.

floor_id.description: Floor ID this area belongs to

functions.name: remove_area
functions.description: Delete an area by ID.

functions.name: list_floors
functions.description: List all floors configured in Home Assistant.

functions.name: set_floor
functions.description: Create or update a floor. Omit floor_id to create; include it to update.

floor_id.description: Floor ID to update. Omit to create a new floor.

functions.name: remove_floor
functions.description: Delete a floor by ID.

functions.name: list_zones
functions.description: List all zones (geographic areas for presence detection).

functions.name: set_zone
functions.description: Create or update a zone. Omit zone_id to create; include it to update.

zone_id.description: Zone ID to update. Omit to create a new zone.

radius.description: Zone radius in meters. Defaults to 100.

passive.description: Whether the zone is passive (no enter/leave events)

functions.name: remove_zone
functions.description: Delete a zone by ID.

functions.name: list_groups
functions.description: List all groups and their member entities.

functions.name: set_group
functions.description: Create or update a group of entities.

functions.name: remove_group
functions.description: Remove a group.

functions.name: list_labels
functions.description: List all labels configured in Home Assistant.

functions.name: set_label
functions.description: Create or update a label. Omit label_id to create; include it to update.

label_id.description: Label ID to update. Omit to create a new label.

functions.name: remove_label
functions.description: Delete a label by ID.

functions.name: get_entity
functions.description: Get entity registry information including area, labels, and configuration.

functions.name: set_entity
functions.description: Update entity registry settings (name, icon, area, labels, etc.).

area_id.description: Area ID to assign the entity to

disabled_by.description: Set to 'user' to disable, null to enable

hidden_by.description: Set to 'user' to hide, null to unhide

functions.name: list_devices
functions.description: List all devices registered in Home Assistant.

functions.name: get_device
functions.description: Get details for a specific device by ID.

functions.name: update_device
functions.description: Update device registry settings.

area_id.description: Area ID to assign the device to

disabled_by.description: Set to 'user' to disable, null to enable

functions.name: list_helpers
functions.description: List all input helpers (input_boolean, input_number, input_text, etc.).

functions.name: set_helper
functions.description: Create a new input helper or update its value via service call.

helper_type.description: Helper type: input_boolean, input_number, input_text, input_select, input_datetime, counter, timer

config.description: Configuration for the helper (name, min, max, options, etc.)

functions.name: remove_helper
functions.description: Remove an input helper entity.

functions.name: list_dashboards
functions.description: List all Lovelace dashboards.

functions.name: get_dashboard
functions.description: Get the full configuration of a Lovelace dashboard.

url_path.description: Dashboard URL path. Omit for the default dashboard.

functions.name: set_dashboard
functions.description: Save a Lovelace dashboard configuration.

url_path.description: Dashboard URL path. Omit for the default dashboard.

config.description: Full Lovelace dashboard configuration (views, cards, etc.)

functions.name: delete_dashboard
functions.description: Delete a Lovelace dashboard.

functions.name: list_dashboard_resources
functions.description: List all Lovelace dashboard resources (custom cards, themes, etc.).

functions.name: set_dashboard_resource
functions.description: Create or update a Lovelace dashboard resource.

resource_id.description: Resource ID to update. Omit to create a new resource.

functions.name: get_calendar_events
functions.description: Get events from a calendar entity.

start.description: Start date/time in ISO 8601 format. Defaults to now.

end.description: End date/time in ISO 8601 format. Defaults to 24 hours from start.

functions.name: create_calendar_event
functions.description: Create a new calendar event.

functions.name: delete_calendar_event
functions.description: Delete a calendar event.

functions.name: get_todo_items
functions.description: Get items from a todo list entity.

functions.name: add_todo_item
functions.description: Add an item to a todo list.

functions.name: update_todo_item
functions.description: Update a todo list item.

item.description: Current item text (used to identify the item)

due_date.description: New due date in YYYY-MM-DD format

functions.name: remove_todo_item
functions.description: Remove an item from a todo list.

functions.name: check_config
functions.description: Validate the Home Assistant configuration files.

functions.name: restart
functions.description: Restart the Home Assistant server. Requires explicit confirmation.

confirm.description: Must be true to proceed with restart

functions.name: reload
functions.description: Reload a specific configuration domain without restarting.

target.description: What to reload: automations, scripts, scenes, groups, core, themes, or all

functions.name: get_system_health
functions.description: Get system health information including versions, resource usage, and integration status.

functions.name: get_updates
functions.description: Get available updates for Home Assistant core, OS, and integrations.

functions.name: list_integrations
functions.description: List configured integrations (config entries), optionally filtered by domain.

domain.description: Filter to a specific integration domain

functions.name: delete_integration
functions.description: Remove an integration config entry.

functions.name: set_integration_enabled
functions.description: Enable or disable an integration.

disabled_by.description: Set to 'user' to disable, or null to enable

functions.name: render_template
functions.description: Render a Jinja2 template using Home Assistant's template engine.

functions.name: get_camera_image
functions.description: Get a camera snapshot as a base64-encoded image.

functions.name: list_blueprints
functions.description: List available blueprints for a domain.

functions.name: import_blueprint
functions.description: Import a blueprint from a URL.

url.description: URL of the blueprint to import

functions.name: list_addons
functions.description: List installed Home Assistant add-ons (requires Supervisor).

functions.name: get_error_log
functions.description: Get the Home Assistant error log.
